description: Dredging of Class B underwater material
full_summary:
## ITT - Contract for Floating Plant Dredging in the Gulf Region of New Brunswick

### Tender Information

- **Reference Number**: WS4440660543
- **Publication Date**: February 19, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
- **Procurement Category**: CNST (Construction, Nursing and Social Services Trades)

### Project Overview

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), is seeking proposals for a Floating Plant Dredging contract in the Gulf Region of New Brunswick.

### Scope of Work

The contract entails dredging of Class "B" underwater materials at four locations: 
- Chockpish Channel
- Les Aboiteaux Channel
- Saint-Edouard Channel
- Caissie-Cape Channel

The dredged material will be disposed of at each wharf location in the Westmorland and Kent Counties, Gulf Region of New Brunswick.

### Contract Requirements

- All work must be completed within 16 weeks of award.
- Site visit: no site visit is scheduled; bidders are advised to visit the site prior to submitting their proposal.
- Enquiries: to be submitted to the Contracting Authority through the Messages function in SAP Ariba, at least 5 days prior to the closing date.

### Tendering Information

- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Official Languages**: either English or French may be used for the submission

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Authority**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Person**: Nicole Fesseha (nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Submission Deadline

- Proposals must be submitted via SAP Ariba on or before March 5, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
- Estimated cost of the project: between $500,001 and $1,000,000

Please note that all proposals must be submitted electronically through SAP Ariba. The link to the tender notice is available at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18836270?extsite=MTg4MzYyNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

Note: I have removed all the unnecessary information and kept only the relevant data for your project. Let me know if you need any further
